Vlad Stanković Front-End Developer

Creative Thinker

About me

  • Product Design
  • UX Design
  • Prototyping
  • Development
  • Team Lead

I'm a freelance creative front‑end developer and team leader. I enjoy collaborating with multi-disciplinary groups to solve complex problems and create intuitive experiences.

My services include product design - from wireframing and prototyping, to interface design and front-end development. I’m interested in clean aesthetics, minimalism, and simplistic UX solutions. I develop and design concepts for Responsive Web Design approaches and also guide, coach and mentor members of creative teams.
